text: Tame kahi do ke mari pase to mara palanahara taraphathi eka puravo che, parantu tame tene juthalavo cho, je vastu vise tame utavala kari rahya cho, te mari pase nathi, allaha sivaya ko'ino adesa nathi calato, allaha ta'ala kharekhara satya vatane janavi de che ane sauthi saro nirnaya karanara te ja che
